goal.en: 學習電荷在靜止時或移動中所造成的效應。瞭解基礎電磁原理與應用，建立繼續修習如微波工程及天線工程相關專業課程之根基。To study the effects of electric charges that are at rest or in motion. To understand the basic principles in electromagnetics and the related applications. To lay the foundation for learning advanced topics such as microwave engineering and antenna engineering.
goal.ch: 學習電荷在靜止時或移動中所造成的效應。瞭解基礎電磁原理與應用，建立繼續修習如微波工程及天線工程相關專業課程之根基。To study the effects of electric charges that are at rest or in motion. To understand the basic principles in electromagnetics and the related applications. To lay the foundation for learning advanced topics such as microwave engineering and antenna engineering.

content.en:
- Plane Waves
- Transmission Lines
- Waveguides (Optional)
- Antennas (Optional)
content.ch:
- Plane Waves
- Transmission Lines
- Waveguides (Optional)
- Antennas (Optional)

textbook.en: David K. Cheng, Field and Wave Electromagnetics, 2nd edition, Addison-Wesley, 1989
textbook.ch: David K. Cheng, Field and Wave Electromagnetics, 2nd edition, Addison-Wesley, 1989

grading.en: See the Syllabus, which will be posted after the semester begins.

flex_desc.en: The course duration is 16 weeks. The students are encouraged to watch the prerecorded video lessons online for the 17th and 18th weeks.
flex_desc.ch: 課程僅 16 週。第 17 及 18 週鼓勵學生觀看線上教學影片。
